title: Fatelinker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Add a player into your **Soul**.
-Pick a player in your **Soul**, and learn their role.
-Pick a player in your **Soul**, and any attacks dealt towards you tonight Is redirected to them.
-Pick 2 players in your **Soul**. Player A Is controlled into Player B, and you will learn Player A's role.
-Pick 2 players in your **Soul**. They are now linked, and share any effects such as roleblocks, redirects, poison and death.
-[Soul Blast-3] When using this ability, you may pay the cost. If you do, you may perform up to 2 abilities the next night.
-[Soul Blast-4] When using this ability, you may pay the cost. If you do, roleblock up to 4 players the next night, bypassing roleblock Immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-**Soul:** When a player enters a **Soul**, they are roleblocked. The player remains in the **Soul** for the rest of the game (unless removed by things such as Soul Blast.) The user of the **Soul** knows who players in the **Soul** visit. Players in the **Soul** do not know they are in the **Soul.**
-**Soul Blast-X** Choose exactly X players in your **Soul**, and remove them from your **Soul**. If you cannot remove exactly X players, you may not **Soul Blast.**
-To **pay the cost** means to perform the actions written in [] at the start of the ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Enact your divine fate upon the town. (Live to see the Town lose the game.)

desc:
